issue.title: [R] Handle group_by .drop parameter in summarize
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14044](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14044). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We collect it and pass it around, but we aren't doing anything with it in summarize() and we don't have any failing tests for it. We should either support it or error/warn if it is set to a value we can't support.
